mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_ID, NICKNAME, B.GRADE, B.INTRODUCE, M.GENDER, ( SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_FOLLOW F WHERE F.FOLLOWED_MEMBER_ID = MEMBER_ID ) AS LIKE_COUNT, CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_FOLLOW F WHERE F.FOLLOWED_MEMBER_ID = MEMBER_ID AND F.FOLLOWER_MEMBER_ID = #{viewerId} ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS LIKED FROM TB_BLOG B JOIN TB_MEMBER M USING(MEMBER_ID) WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
